profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.themeWarning: Note: Make sure the website theme doesn't conflict with your OS/browser theme for best experience.

howTo.title: How to Use Gemdi
howTo.step1Desc: Click the upload button on your dashboard and select your study notes, PDFs, or documents. Gemdi's AI will analyze and process your content.
howTo.step2Desc: Once processed, Gemdi generates a personalized study plan with organized topics, flashcards, and detailed notes extracted from your material.
howTo.step3Desc: Click on any study phase to launch interactive flashcard drills. Tap to flip cards and track your progress through each session.
howTo.step4Desc: Take AI-generated quizzes to assess your understanding. Gemdi adapts to your learning style over time based on your performance.
howTo.step5Desc: Click your profile to personalize your avatar, display name, and theme preferences (light, dark, or system).
howTo.proTipDesc: Rate your session after each drill to help Gemdi's AI learn your preferences and optimize future study materials for your learning style.

dashboard.aiFoundUnusual: AI found this document unusual for study material.
dashboard.dropPdfDocx: Drop in a PDF or DOCX to start a new study session
dashboard.streakBuild: Log in daily to build your streak
dashboard.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All study progress, flashcards, and quiz results will be permanently deleted.
dashboard.enterNewName: Enter a new name for this study session
dashboard.pressEnterConfirm: Press {enter} to confirm or {esc} to cancel
